meanings.sent1: Grandpa chunters about the weather every morning.
meanings.sent2: The students chunters quietly during the test.
meanings.sent3: The cat chunters to itself while stalking a bird.
meanings.sent4: The engine chunters as the car struggles up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The old man chunters on, oblivious to the world around him.

meanings.sent1: The chunters of the distant stream were soothing.
meanings.sent2: The chunters of the crowd filled the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The eerie chunters in the forest made the hikers nervous.
meanings.sent4: The chunters of the wind through the trees sounded like whispers.
meanings.sent5: The constant chunters of the machinery created a rhythmic background noise.
